## CEDEFOP's dashboard for greenness and green pervasiveness across regions
### Description

This dashboard presents trends in greenness and pervasiveness across occupations in NUTS II regions for a selected year/quarter. The word cloud displays the top 30 green skills for selected occupations, defined by ESCO v 1.1.1 and augmented by Cedefop.
